title.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. II, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. 1924 "Pushkin Evemning" for Benefit of Federation of Russian Children Schools of Chicago and Suburbs

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. II, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. "PUSHKIN EVEMNING" FOR BENEFIT OF FEDERATION OF RUSSIAN CHILDREN SCHOOLS OF CHICAGO AND SUBURBS

body.p: On November 9, 1924, the federation gave a "Pushkin Evening," with readings from the poet, speeches on his work, and songs.
